hero.name: Suzan Bülbül
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: In frontend-focused projects, I develop performant, sustainable and reusable interfaces with modern frameworks. I build component-based structures with Vue.js/Nuxt.js, React.js/Next.js and develop responsive and user-friendly interfaces.

about.title: About Me
about.description: My passion for technology and software development, combined with my desire to continuously learn and improve myself, drives me to do my best to produce quality and effective solutions.
about.intro: Hello! I'm Suzan Bülbül, a Computer Engineering graduate and working as a Full Stack Developer.
about.experience: During my 4+ years of experience, I specialized in frontend-focused projects and developed performant, sustainable web applications with modern frameworks.
about.skills: I particularly enjoy working with React.js, Vue.js, TypeScript and Node.js technologies.
about.passion: Learning new technologies, solving complex problems and improving user experience are my biggest sources of motivation.
about.goal: My goal is to develop projects that make people's lives easier and add value through technology.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: I keep myself up to date in this rapidly changing field of technology. I love learning new frameworks and tools.

code.title: Clean Code
code.description: I pay attention to writing readable, maintainable and testable code. I participate in code review processes.

team.title: Teamwork
team.description: I am a developer with strong communication skills, responsible and harmonious working within the team.

skills.title: My Technology Skills
skills.description: Technologies and tools I have used during my 4+ years of experience. I've indicated my experience range based on my usage duration for each technology.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: Experiences I gained and projects I completed at international companies during my 4+ year journey

description: Developed and led multiple frontend and backend projects.
Developed different web applications with systems that analyze URLs and subdomains.
Designed from scratch the authentication, authorization structure and widget SDK for a CMS product; continuing to develop new features.
Managed all development processes from design stage to deployment process.
Developed and implemented scalable serverless architectures.
Set up custom Storybook environment and configured automated CI/CD pipelines.
Took over workflow and process management in the projects I was involved in.
Developed drone logistics management interfaces for Anymile super app
Shared component library (Storybook) implementation across 6 applications
Authentication, advanced authorization and content filtering systems
User preferences management (metric values, language, timezone)
Comprehensive UI component development for globally used platform
Component documentation and test process management
Created UI/UX-compatible visual reports
Register/login data processing and algorithm analysis implementation
Performed data flow and state management optimization
Custom component development with Component without Library approach
Mailing system and D3.js data visualization integration
Platform performance improvements and platform structure strengthening
Developed SEO-compliant product marketing, documentation and blog pages
Crypto asset listing, transactions and user management interface design
User interface and landing page development for trading platform
Landing Page - Mailing system integration
Content management systems setup with Strapi CMS
SEO optimization and version control management with GitLab
Developed admin and consumer panels using MongoDB and Vue.js
Authentication, forms and search integration systems
MongoDB database operations and Vue.js frontend implementation
User management and database integration processes
API integrations and backend-frontend coordination
Experience in software development lifecycle and agile processes

contact.title: Let's Get in Touch
contact.description: Don't hesitate to contact me about new projects, collaboration opportunities or any other matter. Together we can create great things and create value with technology.

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: As a Computer Engineer, I have 4+ years of experience in frontend-focused projects. I develop scalable and maintainable web applications with modern frameworks. I have experience in remote work and international projects.
